Ah, mia bambina! (Ah, my little girl!)

This is the game that made me realize that I don't like puzzle platformers. About halfway through I was constantly looking up guides & videos on how to clear each level, and that isn't fun for me. You need to be thinking at least 5 steps ahead, maybe I am just a moron with a low iq for puzzles like this. I can at least say I tried. Portal 2 is basically Portal 1 but with a better story or a semblance of one.

Great coop puzzle game that in a short time span will make you feel dumb as rocks and smarter than Einstein. My wife and I strengthened our marriage bond through this teamwork game and luckily, we were pretty much even as far as figuring stuff out. ;)

this game is an absolute classic, great gameplay, so good in-fact that the memes although dated as they may be, pay homage to just how great this game actually is.

It 's a fps puzzle game that holds up even  8 years later (at time of writing) heck what else can you say its portal 2 it speaks for itself.
great game, the campaign was super imaginative and endearing, now i want a portal 3 to be released

el final nunca cansa

This game is purely amazing. You go through various test chambers while trying to escape and then you go back to the older versions of test chambers and learn much about what happened to the founder of the company cave johnson. You can also create your own test chambers and play with friends in a coop world with unique challenging test chambers. This game also has weird humour to it which I find amazing. And if you feel like there is nothing more you can do in this game, try to get all achievments, try to use as little amounts of portals as possible, try to complete the game within a day. there are lots and lots of challenges and fun stuff you can still try out even after you completed the game multiple times.

Valve yine yapmış yapacağını o zamanlar... Nerden başlasam? Hayatımda gördüğüm en iyi son mu desem, sağlam karakterleri mi desem, multiplayer modunun bile hikaye modu kadar zevkli olduğundan mı bahsetsem bilemiyorum. Oyun Portal 1' in sonundan direk başlıyor gibi bir şey. UYARI!!! Yine bir odada uyanıyoruz ve Wheatley adında bir robotun bize yardım etmesi ile odadan çıkıyoruz. Ancak bir şekilde yanlışıkla burası spoiler'lı  [spoiler] Portal 1' in sonunda alt ettiğimiz [/spoiler] GLaDOS' u tekrar aktif ediyoruz ve devamında da kendine çeken bulmacaları ile size keyifli bir deneyim yaşatıyor. Bulmacalar gittikçe zorlaşıyor ancak o kadar zor değil. Zaten birini çözdüğünüzde diğerini de çözmek istiyorsunuz. Oyuna puan versem 10/10 veririm. Arkadaşlar şunu söyleyeyim hayatımda bu kadar sağlam bir oyun sonu görmedim oyunun tam hikayesine hakimseniz sonundaki Cara Mia şarkısını çok iyi anlarsınız ve tüyleriniz diken diken olur. Neyse indirimlerde çok pahalı olmuyor alın oynayın 12 saatte de bitiyor. Kesinlikle değer... Teşekkürler Valve... Keşke tekrar oyun yapmaya başlasan    :(

Bardzo dobra druga część. Doszły nowe możliwości rozwiązywania zagadek, co w bardzo ciekawy sposób rozwinęło tę grę. Podoba mi się to, że doszła opcja gry na multi jako kooperacja. Jeszcze nie próbowałem, ale ciekawi mnie to. Ogólnie gierka spoko i polecam, ale warto kupić na przecenie, bo jest dość krótka i nie warta tylu pieniędzy bez zniżki.
